001package net.tvburger.jdl.knn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Floats;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.SimpleHolder;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.distances.DistanceMetric;
009
010import java.util.Comparator;
011import java.util.Set;
012import java.util.TreeSet;
013
014public class NearestNeighbors implements EstimationFunction {
015
016    private final DistanceMetric distanceMetric;
017    private final NeighborWeighting neighborWeighting;
018    private DataSet memory;
019    private int k;
020
021    public NearestNeighbors(int k, DistanceMetric distanceMetric, NeighborWeighting neighborWeighting) {
022        this.distanceMetric = distanceMetric;
023        this.neighborWeighting = neighborWeighting;
024        this.k = k;
025    }
026
027    public DataSet getMemory() {
028        return memory;
029    }
030
031    public void setMemory(DataSet memory) {
032        this.memory = memory;
033    }
034
035    public int getK() {
036        return k;
037    }
038
039    public void setK(int k) {
040        if (k <= 0) {
041            throw new IllegalArgumentException("k must be positive!");
042        }
043        this.k = k;
044    }
045
046    @Override
047    public float[] estimate(float[] inputs) {
048        if (k < 0) {
049            throw new IllegalStateException("Invalid k set (" + k + ")! Must be positive!");
050        }
051        if (memory == null || memory.samples().isEmpty()) {
052            throw new IllegalStateException("Model has not been trained!");
053        }
054        if (k > memory.samples().size()) {
055            throw new IllegalArgumentException("We have not enough samples!");
056        }
057        float maxDistance = Float.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
058        Set<Pair<DataSet.Sample, Float>> neighbors = new TreeSet<>(furthestFirst());
059        for (DataSet.Sample sample : memory) {
060            float sampleDistance = distanceMetric.distance(sample.features(), inputs);
061            if (neighbors.size() < k) {
062                neighbors.add(Pair.of(sample, sampleDistance));
063                if (sampleDistance < maxDistance) {
064                    maxDistance = sampleDistance;
065                }
066            } else if (sampleDistance < maxDistance) {
067                neighbors.remove(neighbors.iterator().next());
068                neighbors.add(Pair.of(sample, sampleDistance));
069                maxDistance = sampleDistance;
070            }
071        }
072        SimpleHolder<Float> totalWeights = new SimpleHolder<>(0.0f);
073        float[] estimation = new float[neighbors.iterator().next().left().targetOutputs().length];
074        neighbors.forEach(p -> {
075            float distance = p.right();
076            float weight = neighborWeighting.weight(distance);
077            float[] neighborOutputs = p.left().targetOutputs();
078            totalWeights.adjust(f -> f + weight);
079            for (int i = 0; i < estimation.length; i++) {
080                estimation[i] += weight * neighborOutputs[i];
081            }
082        });
083        for (int i = 0; i < estimation.length; i++) {
084            estimation[i] = estimation[i] / totalWeights.get();
085        }
086        return estimation;
087    }
088
089    @Override
090    public int arity() {
091        if (memory == null || memory.samples().isEmpty()) {
092            throw new IllegalStateException("Not trained!");
093        }
094        return memory.samples().iterator().next().features().length;
095    }
096
097    @Override
098    public int coArity() {
099        if (memory == null || memory.samples().isEmpty()) {
100            throw new IllegalStateException("Not trained!");
101        }
102        return memory.samples().iterator().next().targetOutputs().length;
103    }
104
105    private Comparator<? super Pair<DataSet.Sample, Float>> furthestFirst() {
106        return (p1, p2) ->
107                Floats.equals(p1.right(), p2.right())
108                        ? 0
109                        : Floats.greaterThan(p1.right(), p2.right())
110                        ? -1
111                        : 1;
112    }
113}
